entry.title: $2600 // ~*Incredible luxury 1 bed! Brewery, gym, laundry, etc~*&
entry.content:
Out of this world --- Gorgeous luxury 1 bedroom! Multiple options available.

-- no fee
-- real photos

Apartment features:
* Huge - extremely sunny living room
* Huge private terrace
* 1 big bedroom
* Dishwasher
* Central AC

Building features:
* Doorman
* Game room
* Gym
* Laundry
* Brewery for beer and wine
* Pet spa
* Roof deck w/ mini golf, city views, pet run, green market area, art gallery, courtyard waterfall, etc...
* Parking




Close to JMZ trains, Morgan L, countless bars and restaurants
Other 1 bedrooms in the building may have skyline views / balcony / extra office - many options to choose from.

entry.title: $2350 // Luxury 1 br that your friends will be jealous of! A must see!
entry.content:
Gorgeous new 1 bedroom in prime Bushwick! Unlike any other luxury building in Bushwick!

- no fee
- pets welcome

* spacious layout
* sunny
* dishwasher
* central AC
* tons of closet space
* 1 bath

Building features
- 24 hour doorman
- elevator
- gym
- laundry
- back yard and roof deck
- billiard & game room
- parking
- bike storage
- media room with screening area

Amazing location, near Central JMZ trains, Archie's Pizza, Bushwick Bakery, Central Cafe, Juno Bar, etc...
